text: Discovering new places is a fun-filled experience
That will change your life forever.
Each country has its own tourist charm!
So it is understandable why choosing the destination for our next vacation is so difficult.
If you are in the United States or plan to travel there soon
You need to know where to tour!
Perhaps you are overwhelmed by the colossal size of the third-largest country in the world.
Don't worry!

Let me show you the most emblematic places that you can't miss while 
you are there.
You'll find out that this country is more than just Disney World!
No. 1 Liberty Island
On the famous island, located in the southern part of Manhattan, New York,
You will see the renowned lady liberty.
A huge woman of 93 meters high
That was built in steel and aluminum.
This statue is the highest representation of freedom and democracy in the world
Since October 1886.
This grand monument symbolizes the alliance between France
And the United States.
The statue and the pedestal design were by Bartholdi and Eiffel
Famous French sculptors of the time
Yes! The same author of the Eiffel Tower!
When you visit this place, be sure to stop by the statue of liberty museum.
There you can learn more about its history, rarities, and important artifacts
Revealed  in its exhibits.
And you will also find emblematic objects about the sculpture
Such as its original torch!
No.  2 The Golden Gate Bridge
If you go to San Francisco in California
You will find one of its most emblematic bridges.
It is known for being one of the longest and highest suspension bridges globally,
With a length of 2.7 km and a height of 227 meters.
Although the Golden Gate isn't made of gold
Iit is a vital means of communication between the northern San Francisco peninsula
And Marin County for its citizens.
Edgar Stone, Marshall Weigel, and Stuart Greenberg were the first to cross it in 1937.
Bringing a whole new generation of development to San Francisco!
No. 3 The Grand Canyon
The great Colorado River crosses this great arid land, located in the north of Arizona.
The UNESCO declared it a world heritage site in 1979.
One thing many visitors remark about the place is its stunning panoramic views.
It also has a considerable geological and ecological value for scientists
Thanks to the tremendous biological diversity that it holds.
Don't miss the opportunity of rafting in the river rapids
Or hiking through its imposing rocks!
If it is your first time in the Grand Canyon, you should make your visit accompanied by an expert guide.
They will help you explore the place without any risk!
No. 4 Yellowstone National Park
It is the first national park in the country
Inaugurated in 1872 and distributed among Idaho, Wyoming, and Montana.
It shelters a tremendously diverse species of wild animals
Like moose, bears, wolves, and bison.
So during your visit, you can enjoy beautiful landscapes surrounded by the calm of nature.
This park is the perfect place for nature lovers and outdoor activities.
Here, you can fish in the Yellowstone Lake
Camp, watch birds, hike, and explore with the forest rangers.
You can explore by boat, biking, and horseback riding.
If you want to know more about the Yellowstone National Park history
Attend the exhibitions and projections that the guides present
Continuously in their facilities!
No. 5 Times Square
During your visit to New York city
Donâ€™t forget to pass between Broadway and Seventh Avenue
This emblematic area has been the scene of several American films!
You can have fun and learn more about the famous New York City in different topics such as arts
History, and even fashion museums.
Enjoy the New York city's typical food in the restaurants and bars surrounding the Square.
When the night falls time square is full of light.
You will be entirely illuminated by the big screens and advertising of the most famous brands in the world.
In the city that never sleeps
No. 6 Las Vegas Strip
The Las Vegas Strip is the place to be surrounded by the most famous casinos and luxury hotels in the country.
And of course, gambling is priority on the agenda!
When you visit Las Vegas Boulevard
You will find the famous Bellagio hotel fountain
Known for having more than 1200 water jets that move to the music's rhythm.
The parties continue at night and are the best time to find all kinds of fun on the boulevard.
All the casinos and hotels will fill with lights and colors
Making the tour of Las Vegas is full of life.
You cannot fail to visit any of its establishments
Thereâ€™s a reason why their shows are worldwide famous!
You canâ€™t miss them!
No. 7 Mount Rushmore National Memorial
Mount Rushmore is one of the most famous structures in South Dakota.
When looking at this mount
You can admire the faces of Presidents George Washington, Thomas Jefferson
Theodore Roosevelt, and Abraham Lincoln, sculpted in granite.
This sculpture took 14 years to complete
Because the design is considered quite complicated due to its dimensions.
Each face measures a total of 18 meters high and 62 meters long in a straight line.
Those are definitely some big presidents!
You can visit the exploration area
The youngest will surely enjoy it!
You can also find a museum
Enjoy a snack in the cafe and take incredible pictures of this amazing tourist attraction
No. 8  The Niagara Falls
This famous state park is a natural wonder found between the United States
And Canada since 1885.
Youâ€™ll technically be in two countries at a time!
You will notice there are three waterfalls
Formed by Horseshoes falls, American Falls, and Bridal Veil Falls.
Enjoy this wet tour through the walks and viewpoints along the park.
A great way to appreciate the natural wonder
Is by taking the cruise of the "Maid of the Mist" that operates since 1846.
But one thing is sure!
You wonâ€™t stop feeling the freshness of its waters from the first moment you enter the park.
No. 9 Space Needle
This futuristic settlement icon was built in 1962
And it represents humanity's spatial aspirations in those years.
Itâ€™s considered an emblem of the city.
The structure is 184 meters high
And the elevators are the fastest in the place
Reaching 16 km per hour.
It has one of the most famous rolling restaurants in the world
Named Sky city.
In its terrace, youâ€™ll be able to take some of the most stunning pictures in the world!
No. 10 Universal Studios
This place is not only home to many blockbuster movie productions
No
It is also full of fun and innovative attractions that will transport you to your favorite film sceneries!
During your visit, you canâ€™t miss taking a tour across the studio's film sets.
Specially for you cinephiles out there!
You must walk around and enjoy the mind-blowing amusement park!
Get a tour to the King Kong 360 3-D attraction
Fast and Furious Supercharged, Jurassic World, The Simpson ride, and the Wizarding World of Harry Potter!.
Universal Studios opened in 1964 and is one of the oldest theme parks in the city.
It also remains as one of the largest film and television show producers in the country.
Knowing incredible places to visit in the U.S.A has never been so easy, right?
In this beautiful country, you will find fun wherever you look
And iconic locations that will take your breath away.
Also, if you feel hungry and your stomach is making funny noises
You can always try its delicious food!
The United States is a country as diverse as its size.
Different cultures have influenced it throughout the years
That is why I recommend you venture into each of its states.
You will notice each one is unique and special
So it's worth going through every part of it!
Have the vacation of your dreams in the United States!
